value: <l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">This is the voice that ousted superstition: the voice of</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">reason, of common sense. By using English, by</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">putting English in the pulpit the preacher was</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">forging the very weapon that gave the</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">old [methods?] a new lease of life.</l>

<add xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" place="margin">
            <l>the same</l>
            <l>house [today?]</l>
            <l>the house <del>that</del></l>
            <l>built on the</l>
            <l>old foundations</l>

              </choice>
